title: Find the Period
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=\operatorname{Acsc}\left(Bx-C\right)+D$$, the period is $$\frac{2\pi}{|B|}$$. So $$T=\frac{2\pi}{\frac{\pi}{2}}=4$$.

title: Find the Horizontal Shift
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=\operatorname{Acsc}\left(Bx-C\right)+D$$, the phase shift is $$\frac{C}{B}$$. So $$h=0$$.

title: Find the Vertical Shift
text: For the standard cosecant function $$f(x)=\operatorname{Acsc}\left(Bx-C\right)+D$$, the vertical shift is D. So vertical shift is $$1$$.
